attributes.action: Please sort out the Wheat from the chaff, (cornflakes)
attributes.additional_details:
We demand that Mr Cameron weedles out all "stupid" people in govenment in response to a recent controversial comment by ex parliamentary member Boris Johnson, and Mayor of London

“The harder you shake the pack, the easier it will be for some cornflakes to get to the top.”

Clearly there are far too many dodgy "cornflakes" who have slipped through the net and who are currently working in the government running our country.  In light of a further comment by Boris "the Government had a DUTY OF CARE for those who could not look after themselves and give everyone else the chance to get on."

As a result we would like you to shake things up and enforce compulsory IQ testing on ALL MP's  including Boris to ensure that the everyone in the government has a genuine IQ higher than 130 rather than the current level most MP's operate on of about 50.
